name: Equestrian Showcase
description: Equestrial 2001 is a horse riding simulator. Included are Military, show jumping, and dressage riding. Famous horses are included, but you can create your own horse as well. Many real courses are included and let you participate in different competitions in different difficulties that will unlock bonuses.
developedBy: Tantalus Interactive Pty. Ltd., IR Gurus Interactive Pty Ltd.
